titleStmt.title: By the honourable Sir William Beeston Kt. His Majesties Lieutenant Governour and commander in chief, in, and over this his island of Jamaica, and other the territories depending thereon in America, and vice-admiral of the same. A proclamation
titleStmt.author: Beeston, William, Sir, b. 1636.

titleStmt.title: By the honourable Sir William Beeston Kt. His Majesties Lieutenant Governour and commander in chief, in, and over this his island of Jamaica, and other the territories depending thereon in America, and vice-admiral of the same. A proclamation
titleStmt.author: Beeston, William, Sir, b. 1636.
Bellomont, Richard Coote, Earl of, 1636-1701.

publicationStmt.publisher: Re-printed exactly according to the originals,

notesStmt.note: Verso of second sheet is blank.

Includes two proclamations by Richard Coote, Earl of Bellomont: first leaf verso, "By His Excellency Richard Earl of Bellomont ... a proclamation ... the 15th day of May, 1699 ... Printed by W. Bradford, Printer to the Kings most Excellent Majesty, in New-York. 1699." (cf. Wing CD-ROM, 1996 B1842B); leaf 2 recto, "By His Excellency Richard Earl of Bellomont ... a proclamation ... the third day of June 1699. Boston, Printed by Bartholomew Green, and John Allen..., 1699." (cf. Wing CD-ROM, 1996 B1842D).
Reproduction of original in the John Carter Brown Library.
